cpt_codes.description: Bronchoscopy, rigid or flexible, including fluoroscopic guidance, when performed; with endobronchial ultrasound (EBUS) guided transbronchial sampling of 3 or more mediastinal and/or hilar lymph node stations or structures

lines.description: Bronchoscopy, rigid or flexible, including fluoroscopic guidance, when performed; with endobronchial ultrasound (EBUS) guided transbronchial sampling of 3 or more mediastinal and/or hilar lymph node stations or structures

coding_summary.notes: EBUS-TBNA staging case with 3+ mediastinal/hilar nodal stations sampled in a single session; no separate diagnostic bronchoscopy, ablation, or peripheral navigation service documented for this encounter.

per_code.note: Single EBUS-TBNA professional service; assumes no modifier 26/TC split and no multiple procedure reduction.

financial_analysis.mppr_assumptions: No other billable bronchoscopic procedures by the same physician on the same date of service; MPPR not applied.
financial_analysis.notes: Values based on 2025 CMS Physician Fee Schedule (national, non-geographically adjusted) as encoded in ip_coding_billing.v2_7 for code 31653.

per_code.summary: Documentation supports EBUS-TBNA with sampling of 3 or more mediastinal/hilar lymph node stations in a single bronchoscopy session, meeting criteria for 31653. No separate diagnostic bronchoscopy, therapeutic airway intervention, or peripheral nodule navigation is described for this encounter.
guideline_refs: AABIP/ACCP EBUS coding guidance for 31652 vs 31653 (3+ stations => 31653).
ip_coding_billing.v2_7 EBUS policy for nodal station counting and bundling.

value: Added registry_entry.billing and registry_entry.coding_support (coding_review) for CPT 31653 using ip_coding_billing.v2_7 2025 facility RVUs and MPFS payments.
This patch updates billing/coding_review only for this note in consolidated_verified_notes_v2_8_part_009.json; other notes in the file still require separate coding_support review.
